entries.description: Fix showing templates from .aws-sam in Sam Deploy (#1380)
Fix creating S3 buckets in us-east-1
Retain view state for Step Functions and Lambda when changing tabs
Add an explorer node for managing ECR repositories
NodeJS and Python Lambda functions can be imported from an AWS account into a local workspace
Lambda functions can be updated with code from ZIP files and directories containing built or unbuilt code
Codelenses in source files can create launch configurations that reference template.yaml resources.
"Create new SAM Application" action is available from the context menu of Lambda nodes in the AWS Explorer
The amount of CloudWatch Logs entries retrieved per request is now configurable.
"Deploy SAM Application" action is available from the context menu of Lambda, CloudFormation, and Region nodes in the AWS Explorer
